org.apache.giraph.io.hcatalog

类 HCatalogVertexOutputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.conf.DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      • org.apache.giraph.io.VertexOutputFormat<I,V,E>
        • org.apache.giraph.io.hcatalog.HCatalogVertexOutputFormat<I,V,E>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex value
    E - Edge value
    所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.giraph.conf.ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

    public abstract class HCatalogVertexOutputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends org.apache.giraph.io.VertexOutputFormat<I,V,E>
    Abstract class that users should subclass to store data to Hive or Pig table. You can easily implement a HCatalogVertexOutputFormat.HCatalogVertexWriter by extending HCatalogVertexOutputFormat.SingleRowHCatalogVertexWriter or HCatalogVertexOutputFormat.MultiRowHCatalogVertexWriter depending on how you want to fit your vertices into the output table.

    The desired database and table name to store to can be specified via HCatOutputFormat.setOutput(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job, org.apache.hcatalog.mapreduce.OutputJobInfo) as you setup your vertex output format with GiraphConfiguration setVertexOutputFormatClass(Class)}. You must create the output table.

      static class  HCatalogVertexOutputFormat.MultiRowHCatalogVertexWriter<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      HCatalogVertexWriter to write each vertex in multiple rows.
      protected static class  HCatalogVertexOutputFormat.SingleRowHCatalogVertexWriter<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      HCatalogVertexWriter to write each vertex in each row.
